title: Critical Spares Inventory Optimization
description: An asset manager wants to optimize the inventory of critical spare parts (e.g., inverters, transformers) across their portfolio to minimize costs while ensuring availability.

tasks.description: Analyze the historical failure rate and lead time for replacement for each critical component.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles failure rate and lead time data for all critical spares.

tasks.description: Calculate the cost of holding each spare part in inventory versus the cost of downtime if a spare is not available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quantifies the cost-benefit tradeoff for each part.

tasks.description: Recommend the optimal number of each spare part to hold in a central warehouse to meet a 98% availability target at the lowest cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of recommended inventory levels for each critical part.
